fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: These are measures placed on the ballot by the legislature and/or the executive.
fxInfo_notes: Converted from (B) to (A) coding by David Altman.
fxInfo_ordering: If no legal provision exists (option 0), skip to question "Initiatives permitted" [v2ddlexci].
fxInfo_question: Is there legal provision for plebiscites?

fxInfo_responses.value: Allowed but non-binding (or with an intervening institutional veto).
